comments.body: TIL about the `|=` operator. For others reviewing: this will replace changed with True iff changed is not True already and a function evaluates to True. Once True, one of these updated returning False won't switch the changed status.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +346,350 @@    for notification_type in ('Bounce', 'Complaint', 'Delivery'):
        changed |= update_notification_topic(connection, module, identity, identity_notifications, notification_type)
        changed |= update_notification_topic_headers(connection, module, identity, identity_notifications, notification_type)

    changed |= update_feedback_forwarding(connection, module, identity, identity_notifications)
